wikipedia_page.main:
James Houston (born 28 December 1982) is an English former rugby league footballer who played in the 2000s and 2010s. He played at representative level for Scotland, and at club level for the Hunslet Hawks, Featherstone Rovers and the York City Knights in the Championship, as a prop or loose forward.
He has played at representative level for Scotland in 2003.

response: *James Houston (rugby league) (born 1982), Scottish rugby league player
